page.title: 02TRADE
page.content: Wootton St. Lawrence has only one shop. It is a small supermarket owned by a couple who have a daughter who helps in the shop. The shop is new. They have lived there for 3 and a half years.The shop is in the centre of the village.Since buying the shop they have added stock and improvements to it.The couple are middle-aged. The shop opens all through the week from about 9-5:30 but on a Sunday 10-12:30.Their daughter is about 14 years old.The shop is not very big. They live above the shop.The shop sells basic essentials.It has a delivery service for milk and papers. They have about 20 customers a day,who they say are very friendly,and the shop is very popular. It is also the village Post Office.
